trans-unit.source: Represents a group of user-scoped application settings in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en grupp av användarspecifika programinställningar i en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] contains a single default settings provider, <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>, which stores configuration data to the local file system in files with the extension `.config`.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] innehåller en enda inställningar standardprovider, <xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>, som lagrar konfigurationsdata till det lokala filsystemet i filer med filnamnstillägget `.config`.</xref:System.Configuration.LocalFileSettingsProvider>

trans-unit.source: The contents of configuration files are structured as XML documents.
trans-unit.target: Innehållet i konfigurationsfiler är strukturerade som XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: User-scoped settings are persisted in a file with the name `username.config`.
trans-unit.target: Användarspecifika inställningar sparas i en fil med namnet `username.config`.

trans-unit.source: Within this file, data is stored as elements within a `<userSettings>` section.
trans-unit.target: I den här filen, lagras informationen som element i en `<userSettings>` avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: Each of these sections is represented by a corresponding ClientSettingsSection.
Each section object is owned and administered by a configuration section handler, which is an <xref:System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler>.
trans-unit.target: Varje avsnitt objekt ägs och hanteras av en avsnittshanteraren, <xref:System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler>.</xref:System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler>

trans-unit.source: The ClientSettingsSection class represents a simple extension of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class, which is used in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] support for general configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ClientSettingsSection representerar en enkel utökning av den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>-klassen, som används i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] stöd för allmän konfigurationsfiler.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about application settings, see the topic [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om inställningar för program finns i avsnittet [programmet inställningar för Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The default ClientSettingsSection constructor initializes the <xref:System.Configuration.ClientSettingsSection.Settings%2A> property.
Gets the collection of client settings for the section.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar insamling av klientinställningar för avsnittet.

trans-unit.source: The Settings property is itself a configuration property.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingElementCollection"></xref> containing all the client settings found in the current configuration section.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingElementCollection"> </xref> som innehåller alla klientinställningar finns i konfigurationsavsnittet aktuella.
